title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default, with a new basic project and a new file called test.xml, the default editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which completely ignores the content of the XML file. If I select test.xml in the Navigator and choose Open With... / Default Text Editor, nothing happens. It does not activate the Default Text Editor. It should open a new editor for the test.xml file with the appropriate editor type, because the editor type is different from the one that is already open.
